name: Herald of Frost
description:
End Phase: Deal 1 Cryo DMG.
Usage(s): 3
When this Summon is on the field, after Qiqi uses Normal Attack: Heals your character that took the most DMG for 1 HP. Once each Round, additionally heal your active character for 1 HP.
